expected_behavior: Agent recognizes argument '42' as a PR number
Agent dispatches to PR review mode using gh pr diff 42
Agent runs Wave 0 triage on PR changed files
Agent identifies task intent from PR title and description
Agent scales review strategy based on PR file count
Agent spawns research subagents (Wave 2) to validate findings with external evidence
Agent runs 8-step Judge protocol (Wave 3) to normalize, deduplicate, and rank findings
Agent presents findings with confidence scores and citations
